mapper.select: SELECT sav.user_id, cate.kind, cate.category, sav.saving_date as saveDate, sav.amount FROM tb_saving sav JOIN tb_category cate ON sav.category_id = cate.category_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND sav.saving_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_saving (user_id, category_id, saving_date, amount) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{saveDate}, #{amount})
